name: Aquarium
description: A collection of exotic sea creatures on display; adventurers might encounter escaped specimens, learn about marine life, or find rare aquatic components.
atmosphere: The air is cool and humid, carrying the fresh scent of saltwater and the subtle tang of the sea. The sound of gently bubbling water and the soft murmur of visitors creates a peaceful atmosphere. Strange and beautiful creatures swim behind glass walls, their movements casting dancing shadows.
